1.title: Contracts: Prohibit Israel Discrimination
1.description: An Act relating to contracts with public agencies; and relating to the State of Israel.

2.title: Gold And Silver Specie As Legal Tender
2.description: An Act relating to specie as legal tender in the state; and relating to borough and city sales and use taxes on specie.

4.title: Hold Legislative Sessions In Anchorage
4.description: An Act relating to convening the legislature in Anchorage; relating to the regulation of lobbying; relating to annual student guests of the legislature; relating to locations of sessions of the legislature; relating to the Legislative Ethics Act; relating to the relocation of functions of state government; and providing for an effective date.

5.title: Public Schools; Opioid Awareness Program
5.description: An Act relating to the duties of the Department of Education and Early Development; relating to public education; relating to opioid abuse awareness and prevention; and providing for an effective date.

6.title: Office Of Administrative Hearings
6.description: An Act relating to the office of administrative hearings; relating to the types of proceedings handled by the office of administrative hearings; relating to the entities that may use the services of the office of administrative hearings; relating to the duties of the chief administrative law judge, including the power to hire professional staff; relating to the qualifications and powers of administrative law judges, including subpoena power; relating to the compensation of the chief administrative law judge; relating to complaints against administrative law judges and hearing officers; relating to reimbursement for costs incurred by the office of administrative hearings; relating to procedures for requesting and conducting proceedings of the office of administrative hearings; and providing for an effective date.

7.title: Electric-assisted Bicycles
7.description: An Act relating to electric-assisted bicycles.

8.title: Add Faculty Member Univ Board Of Regents
8.description: An Act relating to the Board of Regents of the University of Alaska.

9.description: An Act relating to costs of and charges for textbooks and other course materials required for University of Alaska courses; and providing for an effective date.

10.title: Crime: Assault In The Presence Of A Child
10.description: An Act establishing the crime of assault in the presence of a child.

11.title: Municipal Regulation Of Trapping
11.description: An Act relating to municipal regulation of trapping; and providing for an effective date.

12.title: Applicability Of Human Rights Commission
12.description: An Act relating to the definition of 'employer' for the purposes of the State Commission for Human Rights.

13.title: Aggravating Factors At Sentencing
13.description: An Act relating to aggravating factors considered at sentencing.

14.description: An Act relating to peer support counseling programs for law enforcement agencies, emergency service providers, and the Department of Corrections.

15.title: Medicaid Optional Svcs & Cost Containment

16.description: An Act relating to insurance coverage for contraceptives and related services; relating to medical assistance coverage for contraceptives and related services; and providing for an effective date.

17.description: An Act relating to regional fishery development associations; and relating to developing fishery management assessments.

18.description: An Act relating to the registration of commercial vessels; and providing for an effective date.

19.description: An Act relating to participation in matters before the Board of Fisheries and the Board of Game by the members of the respective boards; and providing for an effective date.

20.description: An Act relating to group insurance coverage and self-insurance coverage for school district employees, employees of the University of Alaska, and employees of other governmental units in the state; and providing for an effective date.

21.title: Peace Officer/firefighter Retire Benefits
21.description: An Act relating to participation of certain peace officers and firefighters in the defined benefit and defined contribution plans of the Public Employees' Retirement System of Alaska; relating to eligibility of peace officers and firefighters for medical, disability, and death benefits; relating to liability of the Public Employees' Retirement System of Alaska; and providing for an effective date.

23.description: An Act relating to the membership of the Board of Governors of the Alaska Bar.

25.description: An Act renaming the Alaska Native Language Preservation and Advisory Council as the Council for Alaska Native Languages; and relating to the Council for Alaska Native Languages.

26.description: An Act relating to school athletics, recreation, athletic teams, and sports.

27.description: An Act restricting the release of certain records of convictions; and providing for an effective date.

28.title: Insurance Discrimination
28.description: An Act relating to insurance discrimination.

30.description: An Act relating to the Alaska performance scholarship program.

32.description: An Act relating to penalties for discharges of oil and other pollution violations; and providing for an effective date.

33.title: Confirmation/qualifications Of Judges

34.description: An Act relating to the certificate of need program for health care facilities; and providing for an effective date.

IX, sec. 17(c), Constitution of the State of Alaska, from the constitutional budget reserve fund; and providing for an effective date.

39.description: An Act making appropriations, including capital appropriations and other appropriations; making supplemental appropriations; making appropriations to capitalize funds; and providing for an effective date.

200.title: Oil & Gas Property Tax Assessment
200.description: An Act relating to the assessment of property for the purposes of the oil and gas exploration, production, and pipeline transportation property tax; and providing for an effective date.

201.title: Controlled Sub. Data: Exempt Veterinarian
201.description: An Act exempting veterinarians from the requirements of the controlled substance prescription database; and providing for an effective date.

203.title: Five-year Involuntary Commitments
203.description: An Act relating to involuntary civil commitments.

205.title: Extend State Medical Board
205.description: An Act extending the termination date of the State Medical Board; and providing for an effective date.

211.title: Us President Elect. Popular Vote Compact
211.description: An Act relating to an interstate compact to elect the President and Vice-President of the United States by national popular vote; and relating to the selection of electors for candidates for President and Vice-President of the United States and to the duties of those electors.

217.title: Pfas Use Firefighting
217.description: An Act relating to firefighting substances; and providing for an effective date.

218.title: Public Notice For Water Rights
218.description: An Act relating to public notice for a sale, appropriation, or removal of water, or for filing a declaration of a right of water; and providing for an effective date.

223.title: Register Interior Designers
223.description: An Act relating to registered interior designers and interior design; establishing requirements for the practice of registered interior design; renaming the State Board of Registration for Architects, Engineers, and Land Surveyors the State Board of Registration for Design Professionals; relating to the State Board of Registration for Design Professionals; relating to liens for labor or materials furnished; relating to the procurement of interior design services; and providing for an effective date.

224.title: Physical Therapy Licensure Compact
224.description: An Act relating to an interstate physical therapy licensure compact; relating to the licensure of physical therapists, physical therapist assistants, occupational therapists, and occupational therapy assistants; and providing for an effective date.

225.title: Aud. & Speech-lang Interstate Compact
225.description: An Act relating to an audiology and speech-language interstate compact; relating to the practice of audiology and the practice of speech-language pathology; and providing for an effective date.

230.title: 2023 Revisor's Bill
230.description: An Act making corrective amendments to the Alaska Statutes as recommended by the revisor of statutes; and providing for an effective date.

231.title: Office Of Victims' Rights: Compensation
231.description: An Act relating to the office of victims' rights; and providing for an effective date.

232.title: Cook Inlet: New Admin Area;permit Buyback
232.description: An Act relating to the powers of the Alaska Commercial Fisheries Entry Commission; relating to administrative areas for regulation of certain commercial set net entry permits; establishing a buy-back program for certain set net entry permits; providing for the termination of state set net tract leases under the buy-back program; closing certain water to commercial fishing; and providing for an effective date.

236.title: Reject Compensation Comm Recommendations
236.description: An Act disapproving recommendations of the State Officers Compensation Commission relating to the salaries of state officers; and providing for an effective date.

238.last_action: COSPONSOR(S):KIEHL, KAWASAKI, TOBIN, WIELECHOWSKI, GRAY-JACKSON, DUNBAR, CLAMAN
238.title: Retirement Systems; Defined Benefit Opt.
238.description: An Act relating to the Public Employees' Retirement System of Alaska and the teachers' retirement system; providing certain employees an opportunity to choose between the defined benefit and defined contribution plans of the Public Employees' Retirement System of Alaska and the teachers' retirement system; and providing for an effective date.

239.title: Age For Tobacco/nicotine/e-cig; Tax E-cig
239.description: An Act relating to tobacco, tobacco products, electronic smoking products, nicotine, and products containing nicotine; raising the minimum age to purchase, sell, exchange, or possess tobacco, a product containing nicotine, or an electronic smoking product; relating to the taxation of electronic smoking products and vapor products; and providing for an effective date.

241.title: Telehealth: Multidisciplinary Care Team
241.description: An Act relating to telehealth; relating to multidisciplinary care teams; and relating to the practice of medicine.

245.title: License Plates: Specialty Organizations
245.description: An Act relating to special request specialty organization registration plates; and providing for an effective date.

248.title: Power Cost Equalization Endowment Fund
248.description: An Act relating to the power cost equalization endowment fund; and relating to the Alaska Permanent Fund Corporation.

249.title: Financial Literacy Course In Schools
249.description: An Act establishing a financial literacy education course for public schools; and providing for an effective date.

252.title: Refuse Utility Regulations
252.description: An Act relating to refuse utility rates and Regulatory Commission of Alaska regulations regarding refuse utilities; and providing for an effective date.

254.title: Civil Legal Services Fund
254.description: An Act relating to appropriations to the civil legal services fund.

257.title: Permanent Fund Dividend; Pomv Split
257.description: An Act relating to the Alaska permanent fund; relating to income of the Alaska permanent fund; relating to the amount available for appropriation and appropriations from the earnings reserve account; relating to the permanent fund dividend; and providing for an effective date.

259.title: Employee Rights, Employer Speech
259.description: An Act relating to employee rights; and providing for an effective date.

261.title: Reject Comm Recomm; Legislator Salaries
261.description: An Act relating to payment of legislator salaries; disapproving recommendations of the State Officers Compensation Commission; and providing for an effective date.

262.title: Digital Product Repair
262.description: An Act relating to the diagnosis, maintenance, and repair of products that use digital electronics to operate; adding an unlawful act to the Alaska Unfair Trade Practices and Consumer Protection Act; and providing for an effective date.

263.title: Reaa Fund: Mt. Edgecumbe, Teacher Housing
263.description: An Act relating to the regional educational attendance area and small municipal school district fund; relating to Mt. Edgecumbe High School; and relating to teacher housing.

264.title: Oil & Gas Production Tax; Income Tax
264.description: An Act establishing an income tax on certain entities producing or transporting oil or gas in the state; relating to the oil and gas production tax; and providing for an effective date.

276.last_action: COSPONSOR(S): GRAY-JACKSON, WIELECHOWSKI, TOBIN, DUNBAR, CLAMAN
276.title: Medicare Reimbursement
